definition.name: Pull Request size labeler
definition.description: Label a PR based on the amount of changes
definition.author: CodelyTV

inputs.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
inputs.description: GitHub token needed to interact with the repository

inputs.name: xs_max_size
inputs.description: Max size for a PR to be considered xs

inputs.name: s_max_size
inputs.description: Max size for a PR to be considered s

inputs.name: m_max_size
inputs.description: Max size for a PR to be considered m

inputs.name: l_max_size
inputs.description: Max size for a PR to be considered l

inputs.name: fail_if_xl
inputs.description: Report GitHub Workflow failure if the PR size is xl allowing to forbid PR merge

inputs.name: message_if_xl
inputs.description: Message to show if the PR size is xl
inputs.default: This PR exceeds the recommended size of 1000 lines. Please make sure you are NOT addressing multiple issues with one PR. Note this PR might be rejected due to its size.

inputs.name: github_api_url
inputs.description: URL to the API of your Github Server, only necessary for Github Enterprise customers

inputs.name: files_to_ignore
inputs.description: Whitespace separated list of files to ignore when calculating the PR size (sum of changes)

inputs.name: ignore_line_deletions
inputs.description: Whether to ignore lines which are deleted when calculating the PR size. If set to "true", deleted lines will be ignored.

inputs.name: ignore_file_deletions
inputs.description: Whether to ignore files which are deleted when calculating the PR size. If set to "true", deleted files will be ignored.
